event: Mongol invasion leads to the fall of Pagan

Burma separated from India and becomes a British colony
Japanese invasion of Burma during World War II
Military coup d'état led by General Ne Win
National League for Democracy wins general elections
Saffron Revolution: Mass protests led by monks
First general election under new constitution
Military coup d'état and detention of Aung San Suu Kyi
